channel.title: POSLink UI Design and User Guide
channel.description: Recent content on POSLink UI Design and User Guide

item.description: Option # This page describes all implict intents that BroadPOS app can use to perform actions to select option. Enter Amount # Action TextEntry.ACTION_ENTER_AMOUNT Category TextEntry.CATEGORY Input Extras EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE The package name of BroadPOS app which started activity Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_TYPE Transaction type. Example: “CREDIT SALE” Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_MODE The transaction mode BroadPOS is running in. Default Value is TransMode.NORMAL. Type: String Mandatory The possible values are:

Option # This page describes all implict intents that BroadPOS app can use to perform actions to select option. Enter Amount # Action TextEntry.ACTION_ENTER_AMOUNT Category TextEntry.CATEGORY Input Extras EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE The package name of BroadPOS app which started activity Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_TYPE Transaction type. Example: “CREDIT SALE” Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_MODE The transaction mode BroadPOS is running in. Default Value is TransMode.NORMAL. Type: String Mandatory The possible values are:

Status # This page describes all status broadcast intents. Batch Upload start # Action BatchStatus.BATCH_CLOSE_UPLOADING Category BatchStatus.CATEGORY Input Extras StatusData.PARAM_EDC_TYPE Edc Type Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_TYPE Transaction type. Example: “CREDIT SALE” Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_MODE The transaction mode BroadPOS is running in. Default Value is TransMode.NORMAL. Type: String Mandatory The possible values are: TransMode.NORMAL TransMode.DEMO TransMode.TEST TransMode.TEST_AND_DEMO EntryExtraData.PARAM_TIMEOUT Timeout (unit: ms). Default value is 30000. Type : Long Mandatory
